JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA FRIDAY, THE 5TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 15TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 76 of 2018 CP 230/2017 of JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE COURT OF FIRST CLASS,KASARAGOD DISTRICT CRIME NO. 48/2014 OF KASARAGOD POLICE STATION , KASARGOD PETITIONER/ACCUSED NO.4 FAISAL K.S, S/O. ABDULLA, THALANGARA HOUSE, MAJLIS ROAD, ADKATH, KASARGOD DISTRICT, PIN - 671 121. BY ADV.SRI.V.PREMCHAND RESPONDENT / COMPLAINANT : THE STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI. C.S. HRITWICK THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 05-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: PBS = eis peop tees 2018/KER/453 Cr1.MC.No. 76 of 2018 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S) ' ANNEXURE ANNEXURE I TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT DATED 10.07.2017 IN CRIME NO. 48/2014 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS, KASARGOD. RESPONDENT (S) ' ANNEXURE NIL /TRUE COPY/ PA TO JUDGE PBS BL 2018/KER/453 B.KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 5" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioner is the 4 accused in C.P.No.230 of 2017 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Kasaragod, which has arisen from Crime No.48 of 2014 of Kasargod Police Station, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 341, 323, 324, 308 and 153A IPC read with Section 34 IPC. 2. In the event of surrender of the petitioner before the court below within 15 days from today, the court below shall consider and dispose of the application seeking bail, if any, that may be filed by the petitioner with advance notice to the learned Assistant Public Prosecutor in charge of the case, on the date of filing itself. This Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA JUDGE DSV/5/1/18 // True Copy / P.A.To Judge
